trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of the Recycle Bin and the number of items in it, for a specified drive

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the size of the Recycle Bin and the number of items in it, for a specified drive

target.mrk: Retrieves the size of the Recycle Bin and the number of items in it, for a specified drive

trans-unit.source: [optional] The string that contains the path of the root drive on which the Recycle Bin is located. This string

seg-source.mrk: The string that contains the path of the root drive on which the Recycle Bin is located.

target.mrk: The string that contains the path of the root drive on which the Recycle Bin is located.

trans-unit.source: can be formatted with the drive, folder, and subfolder names, for example "c:\windows\system\".

seg-source.mrk: can be formatted with the drive, folder, and subfolder names, for example "c:\windows\system\".

target.mrk: can be formatted with the drive, folder, and subfolder names, for example "c:\windows\system\".

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is empty string, information is retrieved for all Recycle Bins on all drives.

seg-source.mrk: If this parameter is empty string, information is retrieved for all Recycle Bins on all drives.

target.mrk: If this parameter is empty string, information is retrieved for all Recycle Bins on all drives.

trans-unit.source: The array that contains the following information:

seg-source.mrk: The array that contains the following information:

target.mrk: The array that contains the following information:

trans-unit.source: [0] - The total size of all the objects in the specified Recycle Bin, in bytes.

seg-source.mrk: [0] - The total size of all the objects in the specified Recycle Bin, in bytes.

target.mrk: [0] - The total size of all the objects in the specified Recycle Bin, in bytes.

trans-unit.source: [1] - The total number of items in the specified Recycle Bin.

seg-source.mrk: [1] - The total number of items in the specified Recycle Bin.

target.mrk: [1] - The total number of items in the specified Recycle Bin.

trans-unit.source: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

seg-source.mrk: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.

target.mrk: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.
